name: Mini Asha Pockets
description: An adorable pastry shaped like an Asha. Wrap the meat filling in dough, shape the pastry, then deep-fry until golden. Don't forget to paint on tiny sunglasses with sauce for a playful touch. It's not hard to guess why this snack is so popular — Asha are super, super cute, after all.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mini Asha Pockets
suspicious.description: An adorable pastry shaped like an Asha. A stronger fire was used for fear of undercooking the meat, but the result seems to be closer to a "Mini Ashy Pocket" rather than an Asha. It seems like eating it might just ruin your vacation, so maybe it's best to forget you ever made it...
suspicious.effect: A little surprise from the Easybreeze Holiday Resort.

normal.name: Mini Asha Pockets
normal.description: An adorable pastry shaped like an Asha. Wrap the meat filling in dough, shape the pastry, then deep-fry until golden. Don't forget to paint on tiny sunglasses with sauce for a playful touch. It's not hard to guess why this snack is so popular — Asha are super, super cute, after all.
normal.effect: A little surprise from the Easybreeze Holiday Resort.

delicious.name: Delicious Mini Asha Pockets
delicious.description: An adorable pastry shaped like an Asha. The fluffy, crispy outer layer glimmers gold like Mora. The sweet scent of onions blankets every slice of tender meat like the prelude to a holiday — like the cheerful spring in your step when you walk into your resort.
delicious.effect: A little surprise from the Easybreeze Holiday Resort.
